ygData.messageBody:
Hmm there are many possible nice things with wizard but i think we will
have to wait a bit until they are done well and make some rumor. All other
have get significant buffs and yet they were much easier to play then wizard!
Wizard is hard to play but i like it very much but verant don't have very
well defined a ruole of wizard, they tok from wizard too much to create
other classes, and leaved it without much spell combination possibilitys
you have to get your best DD spells, some low spell to give final strikes,
your best root, skin, and every now and then change one slot to cast buffs.
- Enchanter with buffs, debuffs, int bosting, mana bosting, luul, pets is
realy great to make diferent aproachs they are also only enchant metal caster.
- Magician have nearly our fire power it is lillte bit slower but have a
pet summon food, water, bags no weight, damage shields, ect.
- Necro rules in his solo play but is a litlle bit hampered with starting
factions.
- Wizard is master dimensional traveler, Direct damage dealer (fastest of
them all and do bigest visible hits, wich is most dangerus thing in game as
monsters get pissed fast and go on you!), wizard is also one of best
rooters. But wizard deal best with one blu 2 gets you run for your life,
white will vaste all your mana if and it is realy if you can win and yellow
never dream about it.

But to say wizard class at later lv are very nice with teleports you realy
can go to sell from middle of dungeon travel fast, this is one nice
advantage. You deal much damage and any god group know to aprecite this,
god group you know very fast if you miss a hit they will leve all and try
to get a MOB from you. If they leave you to deal with it alone more then
once my advise is to get out of group fast.

>that there isn't much of a use to be a wizard if you can be a mage and do

>tell me something good about the wiz class to make it worth playing them to
>high levels?
